lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh quarterback Ben Roethlisberger is inactive for Sunday's game against New England, a week after injuring his left knee in a loss to Miami.

headline.main: Steelers' Roethlisberger Out Against New England
headline.print_headline: Steelers' Roethlisberger Out Against New England
